Name: Sword of Dungeons & Dragons
Text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from Rogues and from Clerics.\nWhenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, create a 4/4 gold Dragon creature token with flying and roll a d20 (a twenty-sided die). If you roll a 20, repeat this process.\nEquip {2}

Name: Nerf War
Text: Fire a Nerf® blaster until empty at target library from at least two meters away. For each card knocked off that library, put it into its owner's graveyard and Nerf War deals ½ damage to that player. (Foam darts only.)

Name: Grimlock, Dinobot Leader // Grimlock, Ferocious King
Text: Dinosaurs, Vehicles, and other Transformers® creatures you control get +2/+0.\n{2}, Convert a Transformers toy you own to its other mode: Grimlock, Dinobot Leader becomes Grimlock, Ferocious King.
